segments.text: The children's teamwork is quite remarkable, I must say.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is doing the hard work of climbing and reaching for the cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: His little body is stretched, every muscle strained to get to that jar.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: His sister stands below, an active participant, waiting patiently for her turn.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She's holding her hand up, a silent plea for a share of the loot.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I find their coordinated effort to break the rules quite endearing, actually.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The secret thrill of forbidden cookies must be incredibly exciting for them.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Their mother is so close, yet so far from noticing their little heist.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I imagine the joy they'll feel when they successfully get away with it.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Itâ€™s a classic childhood moment, full of stealth and sweet rewards.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I just hope the stool doesn't give way before they complete their mission.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: That would be a truly sad end to their daring adventure.
segments.speaker: PAR
